channel.title: Matrix 718 need help with shops price editing
channel.description: Hello, I am using matrix 718, i want to make it into a economy server. I put d claws and bandos bcp and tassets in the edgeville shop for testing. [b][i]I dont know how to change the price, and the shop wont let me buy the items no matter what amount of coins i have.[/i][/b] when i click on the item to show price info nothing shows, when i right click buy 1 bandos tassets it doesn't do anything. Please somebody, help me figure out how to fix this.

item.title: Matrix 718 need help with shops price editing
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

[quote=“VillageNinja, post:1, topic:553342”]Hello, I am using matrix 718, i want to make it into a economy server. I put d claws and bandos bcp and tassets in the edgeville shop for testing. I dont know how to change the price, and the shop wont let me buy the items no matter what amount of coins i have. when i click on the item to show price info nothing shows, when i right click buy 1 bandos tassets it doesn’t do anything.
Please somebody, help me figure out how to fix this.[/quote]
Download frostys cache editor prices are in itemsdefination.

Read full topic
item.source: Matrix 718 need help with shops price editing
